## Summary

The Hon'ble National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT), Bengaluru Bench has approved the Composite Scheme of Arrangement for amalgamation of Mangalore Chemicals & Fertilisers Limited (Scrip Code: 530011) into Paradeep Phosphates Limited. The record date for determining shareholder entitlement has been fixed as October 31, 2025. Shareholders of Mangalore Chemicals & Fertilisers Limited will receive 187 fully paid-up equity shares of Rs. 10/- each of Paradeep Phosphates Limited for every 100 fully paid-up equity shares of Rs. 10/- each held in Mangalore Chemicals & Fertilisers Limited.

## Key Points

- NCLT Bengaluru Bench has approved the Composite Scheme of Arrangement for amalgamation
- Transferor Company: Mangalore Chemicals & Fertilisers Limited (Scrip Code: 530011)
- Transferee Company (Resulting Company): Paradeep Phosphates Limited
- Share swap ratio: 187 equity shares of Paradeep Phosphates for every 100 equity shares of Mangalore Chemicals & Fertilisers
- Face value: Rs. 10/- per equity share for both companies
- Trading in Mangalore Chemicals & Fertilisers Limited shares will be suspended from October 31, 2025
- Equity shares of Paradeep Phosphates Limited will be listed on BSE after compliance with requisite formalities

## Regulatory Changes

No new regulatory changes introduced. This circular implements existing NCLT order and merger regulations under the Companies Act.

## Compliance Requirements

- Trading members must note the suspension of trading in Mangalore Chemicals & Fertilisers Limited (Scrip Code: 530011) effective October 31, 2025 (Settlement DR-747/2025-2026)
- Paradeep Phosphates Limited must complete requisite formalities for listing of new equity shares on BSE
- Shareholders need not take any action - share allotment will be done automatically based on holdings as on record date

## Important Dates

- **October 27, 2025**: Notice date
- **October 31, 2025**: Record date for determining shareholder entitlement
- **October 31, 2025**: Trading suspension/No dealings effective date for Mangalore Chemicals & Fertilisers Limited
- **Settlement DR-747/2025-2026**: Applicable settlement number

## Impact Assessment

**For Mangalore Chemicals & Fertilisers Shareholders:**
- Existing shareholders will receive 1.87x equity shares in Paradeep Phosphates Limited for their holdings
- Mangalore Chemicals & Fertilisers Limited will cease to exist as a separate listed entity post-amalgamation
- Trading in Mangalore Chemicals & Fertilisers shares will be suspended from October 31, 2025

**For Paradeep Phosphates Limited:**
- Will become the resulting company absorbing all assets and liabilities of Mangalore Chemicals & Fertilisers
- Increased share capital due to issuance of new equity shares to transferor company shareholders
- Expanded shareholder base

**Market Impact:**
- High impact corporate action affecting all shareholders of both companies
- Share swap ratio of 187:100 represents significant premium for Mangalore Chemicals shareholders
- Both companies operate in chemicals and fertilizers sector - horizontal integration expected
